detaileddescription.para: Deletes a stream buffer that was previously created using a call to xStreamBufferCreate() or xStreamBufferCreateStatic(). If the stream buffer was created using dynamic memory (that is, by xStreamBufferCreate()), then the allocated memory is freed.
A stream buffer handle must not be used after the stream buffer has been deleted.

parameterdescription.para: The handle of the stream buffer to be deleted.
